metadata.title: CVE-2021-33631 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in openEuler kernel on Linux(filesystem modules) allows Forced Integer Overflow.This issue affectsopenEuler kernel: from 4.19.90 before 4.19.90-2401.3, from 5.10.0-60.18.0before 5.10.0-183.0.0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-33631` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1033-ibm - 5.15.0-1033.36~20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in focal is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.4.0-156.173').
